ValidationRule.description: Once the opportunity is closed won, it can't be edited.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
and( $User.Bypass_Validation__c = false,
or( left( RecordTypeId , 15) = left( $Label.RT_Opp_TraditionalEnrollment , 15), left( RecordTypeId , 15) = left( $Label.RT_Opp_ChannelEnrollment , 15), left( RecordTypeId , 15) = left( $Label.RT_Opp_Additional_Semester , 15) ),
ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won"), or( ischanged( CloseDate ), ischanged( RecordTypeId ), ischanged( OwnerId ), ischanged( Original_Program__c ), ischanged( Current_Program__c ), ischanged( Tier_1_Owner__c ), ischanged( z_Family_Interview_Completed__c ), ischanged( Deposit_Date__c ), ischanged( Deposit_Amount__c ), ischanged( Stripe_Email__c ), ischanged( Enrollment_Agreement_Signed_Date_Time__c ) ),
not(ischanged(Current_Program_Automation_Run_Time__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Once the opportunity is Closed Won, it can't be edited. Please submit a case if you need support.
